summary: This bill, the Save Our Seas 2.0 Amendments Act, amends existing legislation to improve the administration of the Marine Debris Foundation and the Marine Debris Program of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA). Key changes include modifications to grant programs, revisions to the Foundation's governance and powers, and the inclusion of Indian Tribes and Tribal Governments in outreach efforts. The bill also reauthorizes appropriations for the Marine Debris Act and makes conforming amendments related to terminology and administrative roles.
